body_html: :) Sorry, I meant random_normal. And my random_normal suggestion is not what you want in any case, since you're talking about a categorical distribution, not a multinormial distribution. I'm in the middle of something, but I may (or may not) have a more useful comment in a couple hours.

body: :)  Sorry, I meant `random_normal`.  And my `random_normal` suggestion is not what you want in any case, since you're talking about a categorical distribution, not a multinormial distribution.  I'm in the middle of something, but I may (or may not) have a more useful comment in a couple hours.
